name: Agent Run In Vector City 2
description:
One of the most thrilling and exciting gameplay that would boost you

Once you start, you won’t be able to pause. The agent mystery continues in this version but this time his son is taking on revenge for his father who was killed in his breath taking action
Enter the city of criminals and kill them. Can you survive longer?
Can you escape this evil and criminal city as much faster as you can?

Gameplay :
• Tap to jump
• Tap to double jump
